TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCLabelTTF extends Cocos2D.CCSprite implements class Cocos2D.ICCLabelProtocol

Docs.summary: <para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" /> is a subclass of TextureNode that knows how to render text labels. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" />
Docs.remarks: <para>All features from TextureNode are valid in <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" /></para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" /><para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" /> objects are slow. Consider using <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /> or <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelBMFont" /> instead.</para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelBMFont" /><para>Custom ttf file can be put in assets/ or external storage that the Application can access. <programlisting><codeline><highlight class="normal">LabelTTF<sp Docs.summary: changes the string to render Changing the string is as expensive as creating a new . To obtain better performance use
Docs.remarks: <para>changes the string to render <para>Changing the string is as expensive as creating a new <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" />. To obtain better performance use <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /></para></para><para>Changing the string is as expensive as creating a new <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelTTF" />.
